players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Be careful, Charlie knows you're the detective.
The villager Alice was found dead this morning.
Charlie: I was up late last night working on some important business matters. Let's focus on finding the real culprit behind Alice's death.
You said: Charlie, since you mentioned being up late, I'm concerned about your involvement in Alice's death. Let's investigate further to clear any doubts.

Diana: Diana: I'm saddened by Alice's death. Let's focus on finding the real culprit and bring them to justice. Charlie, since you've mentioned your late-night activities, I suggest we all share our whereabo...
Diana: Diana: I'm concerned about Charlie's late-night activities and suggest we all share our whereabouts last night for transparency. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's death.

Charlie: I was surprised to hear about Alice's death. Let's all remain calm and focus on gathering facts to determine the real culprit. I believe transparency and collaboration will lead us to the answer.
You said: I propose we all share our whereabouts last night for transparency and help uncover the truth behind Alice's death. Let's work together to bring the real culprit to justice.
